biotools.summary: Distributed dual vigilance fuzzy adaptive resonance theory learns online, retrieves arbitrarily-shaped clusters, and mitigates order dependence. Dual Vigilance Fuzzy ART - Companion MATLAB Code. Distributed Dual Vigilance Fuzzy ART - Companion MATLAB Code.
